title: The First Line
occurrences: The first line of the second paragraph states in Italian, and I quote:
The first line of the second paragraph reads, and I quote:
Amit, in the first line of the second paragraph of the Mektub,
On page two, in the first line of the second paragraph,
to the first line of the second paragraph of Hunt's new letter,
served as the first line of defense,
and the first line of support protecting the sacred chamber within.
Like the one who fights in the first line.
We can stand with her in the first line of defense,
